short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you use NetSuite in the efficient way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using NetSuite Saved Search, sometimes the criteria name is not really straightforward. And the functionality of criteria UI is unfriendly. This extension provide an input field for quickly find your criteria name. Once you put keyword, the corresponding results display in below. When you get the exact criteria name, go to add the criteria in normal way. It can save your time for creating saved search.
